original_text: And at the end of three years they took it: even in the sixth year of Hezekiah, that is in the ninth year of Hoshea king of Israel, Samaria was taken.
korean_text: 삼 년 후에 그 성읍이 함락되니 곧 히스기야 왕의 제육년이요 이스라엘 왕 호세아의 제구년에 사마리아가 함락되매

sentences.original_text: And at the end of three years
even in the sixth year of Hezekiah,
that is in the ninth year of Hoshea king of Israel,
